import { BoyRounded } from '@mui/icons-material' import { Stack } from '@mui/material' import { Button } from '@mui/material' import { Typography } from '@mui/material' import { Box } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' import { amenities as allAmenities} from "../../utils/amenities" export const RoomDetail = ({ roooms }) => { const title = roooms.title const capacity = roooms.capacity const amenities = roooms.amenities const allows = roooms.allows const donts = roooms.donts const description = roooms.description const price = roooms.price const imgUrl = roooms.imgUrl console.log(allAmenities[0].icon) const boy = console.log(boy) return ( Amenities { allAmenities.filter((services) => amenities.map((service) => { service === services.name && // console.log(services.icon)
jgjgk {services.name}
}))} ${price} Description {description} ) }
